text: Trichotroea semiflava is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Trichotroea. It was described by Breuning in 1956.Biolib.cz - Trichotroea semiflava. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1956
title: Trichotroea semiflava
